overview: We're back with more rare loops and scenes featuring little known, but incredibly hot, busty starlets from the 80's! The incredible Laura Sands kick starts this collection with 2 scenes! Next you'll see all of our favorites in rare synch sound loops like Pepper's Mix Up, Hot Marsha, Roses are Red, Dildoe City, Margaret's Target and much more!
title: Busty Ladies In The 80s Volume 1
